mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wechat_admin_login ( adminNo, adminPassword, creatTime, adminIdentity, adminRole ) VALUES ( #{adminNo}, #{adminPassword}, #{creatTime}, #{adminIdentity}, #{adminRole} )
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.adminNo adminNo, a.adminIdentity adminIdentity, a.creatTime creatTime, c.wechatRoleName adminRole from wechat_admin_login a, wechat_admin_login_mation b, wechat_admin_role c WHERE a.id = b.adminId AND a.adminRole = c.id
and a.adminNo like '%${adminNo}%'
and a.adminIdentity=#{wechatUserState}
AND (a.adminIdentity=5 or a.adminIdentity=6)
select count(*) from wechat_admin_login where adminRole=#{id}

SELECT a.adminNo adminNo, a.adminIdentity adminIdentity, a.adminHeadPoint adminHeadPoint, a.adminIDCardOtherPositive adminIDCardOtherPositive, a.adminIDCardPeoAndPosi adminIDCardPeoAndPosi, a.adminIDCardPositive adminIDCardPositive, a.creatTime creatTime, a.adminReason adminReason, c.wechatRoleName wechatRoleName, b.realName realName, b.adminSex adminSex, b.adminAge adminAge, b.adminEducation adminEducation, b.adminNation adminNation, b.adminWorkPlace adminWorkPlace, b.adminHomePlace adminHomePlace, b.adminPoliticalLandscape adminPoliticalLandscape, b.adminQq adminQq, b.adminShopName adminShopName, b.adminShopCard adminShopCard, b.adminShopKey adminShopKey, b.adminWorkXCoordinate adminWorkXCoordinate, b.adminWorkYCoordinate adminWorkYCoordinate, b.adminKfPhone adminKfPhone, b.adminKfBusinessHours adminKfBusinessHours, b.adminRecommend adminRecommend, b.adminCharacteristic adminCharacteristic FROM wechat_admin_login a, wechat_admin_login_mation b, wechat_admin_role c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.id = b.adminId AND a.adminRole = c.id
SELECT count(*) FROM wechat_admin_login WHERE adminNo = #{adminNo}
SELECT id FROM wechat_admin_login WHERE adminNo = #{phoneNum}
select id, adminNo, adminPassword, adminIdentity, adminHeadPoint, adminRole from wechat_admin_login where adminNo=#{adminNo}

SELECT rm.id, rm.icon 'class', rm.`name` 'title', rm.url, r.wechatRoleState wechatRoleState FROM wechat_admin_login l, wechat_admin_role r, wechat_admin_role_menu m, wechat_admin_menu rm WHERE l.adminRole = r.id AND r.id = m.wechatAdminRoleId AND m.wechatAdminMenuId = rm.id AND l.id = #{id} AND rm.jibie = 1

SELECT a.id id, b.realName, a.adminIdentity, a.adminNo adminNo, b.adminWorkPlace, b.adminKfPhone, b.adminShopCard, b.adminShopName FROM wechat_admin_login a, wechat_admin_login_mation b WHERE a.id = b.adminId AND ( a.adminIdentity = '5' OR a.adminIdentity = '1' )
AND a.adminNo like '%${adminNo}%'
AND b.adminWorkPlace like '%${adminWorkPlace}%'
AND b.adminShopName like '%${adminShopName}%'

SELECT a.adminNo, b.realName, b.adminShopName, b.adminKfPhone, b.adminKfBusinessHours, b.adminRecommend, b.adminShopCard, b.adminShopKey, b.adminWorkPlace, b.adminWorkXCoordinate, b.adminWorkYCoordinate, b.adminCharacteristic FROM wechat_admin_login a, wechat_admin_login_mation b WHERE a.adminNo=#{adminNo} AND a.id=b.adminId AND(a.adminIdentity='1' OR a.adminIdentity='5')
mapper.update:
UPDATE wechat_admin_login_mation a, wechat_admin_login b
a.adminShopName = #{adminShopName},
a.adminKfPhone = #{adminKfPhone},
a.adminShopCard = #{adminShopCard},
a.adminShopKey = #{adminShopKey},
a.adminKfBusinessHours = #{adminKfBusinessHours},
a.adminRecommend = #{adminRecommend},
a.adminCharacteristic = #{adminCharacteristic},
a.adminWorkPlace = #{adminWorkPlace},
a.adminWorkXCoordinate = #{adminWorkXCoordinate},
a.adminWorkYCoordinate = #{adminWorkYCoordinate}
WHERE b.id = a.adminId AND b.adminNo = #{adminNo}
